## Factory.constructAsync() method

Constructs an instance of the factory's object, allowing for async resolution of dependencies.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructAsync(container: Container, dynamicDependencies?: Key[]): Promise<Resolved<T>>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

container


</td><td>

[Container](../fast-element.container/)


</td><td>

The container the object is being constructor for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

dynamicDependencies


</td><td>

[Key](../fast-element.key/)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Dynamic dependencies supplied to the constructor.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Resolved](../fast-element.resolved/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;
